website_summaries.verdict: The extreme pizzelle enthusiast without budget constraints will be impressed with this model, but others provide similar results for less.
pros: Classic pattern with a polished finish that resists sticking
Auto thermostat and ready indicator light
Seamless results — makes thin pizzelles in about 30 seconds
cons: The price is high compared to competing brands

customer_reviews.title: Yummm! Very happy with this iron!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make some pizzelles for Christmas presents this year and they turned out great! I am glad I didn't buy one with "non-stick" surface. I saw one in a local store and the surface was just plastic (not a teflon type surface like a non-stick pan). Consuming something that has been heated on/in plastic is not good for you. This one is very non-stick. You only need to spray it with a little oil before you make the first batch of the day. I made like 100 pizzelles after just spraying it once. It is easy to clean too. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: sunny_peach

customer_reviews.title: A pleasant pizzelle surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to all of you who created reviews! I based my decision to purchase on your info. And..I am delighted that I did. I just finished my first batch of pizzelles and did it in half the time my old baker took. The instructions are simple and their recipes are good. I, too, was surprised at how nicely the grids worked and only needed a spatula (not toothpicks and brute force) to remove the pizzelles. Happy holidays to me and all my cookie monsters.
customer_reviews.author: Sher S

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick finish is the BEST!  Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a Villaware Pizzelle Maker for YEARS - and enjoy these cookies several times a year. I bought this one as a part of "my favorite baking items" for my daughter's bridal shower gift basket. The first 2 cookies in a batch are always "tests" - and they never stick from that point on. (I've never used a non-stick pizzelle maker, but have to wonder with that high heat,if that finish's nasty by-products would leech into the cookies - Yech!) Great product and would highly recommend it! This is the brand and type that I've bought for several gifts and everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Michael

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 86 year old mother as a replacement for a very old one she had. She has been making pizzelle's as long as I can remember, and she is very happy with the performance of this pizzelle maker. A good product at a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Pizzelle maker
customer_reviews.text: Simply put I love this machine! I have had it for aprox. 2 years and have had perfect pizzelles every time. Easy to clean easy to use if you buy this machine you will not be disapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Rosen- Marx

customer_reviews.title: Prego Pizzelle V3600
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product before and purchased this for a gift. It is a well made product. Service through Amazon was great. Item was purchased through dealyard.com and their service was fantastic also. JAI
customer_reviews.author: J. Iac

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: wife like this because it does not have non stick like most makers and it makes them the right thickness that she likes .it was hard to find one with out the nonstick coating
customer_reviews.author: walter baum

customer_reviews.title: I Love my new toy!
customer_reviews.text: The Prego V 3600 Pizzelle Iron is wonderful. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants a good iron that doesn't cost a lot of money. Definitely a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: Should I buy this pizzelle iron?
customer_reviews.text: I have used a Pizzelle Maid model #400 for many years. Does this pizzelle iron make the pizzelle's thin and crispy?
customer_reviews.author: NPC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pizelles
customer_reviews.text: This pizelle iron arrived very well wrapped and packaged. It works perfectly. I’ve already made three batches of perfectly thin and crispy pizelles. The clamp fits tightly for thin pizelle cookies. Love the iron!
customer_reviews.author: B4me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much, have bought another for wedding gift. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: Great condition, no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Just the machine arrived. No instructions or cookbook
customer_reviews.author: MCC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Every day is a Goid day for Pizzelles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pizzelle Maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the metal pizzelle maker (without teflon) and it works great, never sticks and is easy to clean. I love making pizzelles!
customer_reviews.author: Diana S. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for pizzelles. It was forty when I bought it eight years ago.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: Non stick
customer_reviews.text: Is there a better one out there? Other than the surface gets extremely hot and its dangerous for children, I would say this iron is perfect. The closing wire for the handle is a bit thin, so I would be careful when closing. The pizzelles come off of the iron so easy. Pour in pepperoni sized batter and close, count to 50 seconds and open. Hah, they are so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Jette

customer_reviews.title: A party dessert hit
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. I wanted to make cannoli shells with it and I made close to forty. The machine is great, it just takes a little time and practice learning how much batter to put into each mold. It was easy to use and easy to clean. Can't get much better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Scherer

customer_reviews.title: V3600 PREGO PIZZELLE BAKER
customer_reviews.text: THIS PIZZELLE BAKER MAKES THE MOST PERFECT PIZZELLES AND THE RECEIPES ARE WONDERFUL. THE PRICE WAS BETTER THAN THE ITALIAN STORES AND DEPARTMENT STORES AND THE SHIPPING WAS CHEAP. I LOVE THS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne B. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Thin and crispy?
customer_reviews.text: I have used an old pizzele iron from my deceased mother-in-law for over 25 years. The element finally gave out. Looking for an iron that makes thin and crispy pizzeles.Does this model make them thin?
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cantanzriti

customer_reviews.title: but FANTASTIC. Perfect pizzelles on my first ever try
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but FANTASTIC. Perfect pizzelles on my first ever try. Used the first recipe in the booklet & was pleased. Plan to get more creative. I did use a silicone spatula to remove the pizzelles & not scratch the surface. Wiped clean with a damp paper towel afterward. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe's Mom

customer_reviews.title: best value pizzelle baker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased irons from three different companys when replacing my 30 year old iron and found this iron to perform the best. I liked it so much I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stehman

product_meta.title: PREGO Pizzelle Baker
product_meta.description: Bakes two 5 inch Italian pizelle cookies in traditional fiore pattern every 30 seconds, with polished metal grids that will not stick. It also has a Steam Guard barrier that will protect hands along with an automatic thermostat and ready light so that the second those cookies are finished you can enjoy!
feature_bullets: Baker has space saving handles and stands upright for compact storage.
Has cord wrap so there won't be any messy cords!
Polished Metal Grids Will Not Stick; Traditional Fiore Pattern

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
